caption.p: Relative weight of pancreas of 21- and 44-day-old broilers fed maize-soybean meal diet (MS), maize-soybean meal diet with enzymes (MSE), or maize-dehulled lupine ( Lupinus angustifolius L. cv. Boregine) diet with enzymes (MLE). Values of p: diet = 0.0013; age <0.0001; and diet×age = 0.0303. ab Different letters within each age (mean±standard error) indicate significant differences (p<0.05).
